UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Hydrophobicity, hydrophobic moment and angle subtended by charged residues modulate antibacterial and haemolytic activity of amphipathic helical peptides
Literature.Author: Dathe M, Wieprecht T, Nikolenko H, Handel L, Maloy WL, MacDonald DL, Beyermann M, Bienert M

Literature.Title: Influence of the angle subtended by the positively charged helix face on the membrane activity of amphipathic, antibacterial peptides.
Literature.Author: Wieprecht T, Dathe M, Epand RM, Beyermann M, Krause E, Maloy WL, MacDonald DL, Bienert M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=700 µM,Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=159 µM
